content.question: A ball of mass m is found to have a weight <math alttext="W sub x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>W</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> on Planet <math alttext="X" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>X</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>. Which of the following is a correct expression for the gravitational field strength of Planet <math alttext="X" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>X</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>?

choices.label: The gravitational field strength of Planet <math alttext="X" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>X</mi></mrow></math> is <math alttext="m g" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>m</mi><mi>g</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>.

The gravitational field strength of Planet <math alttext="X" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>X</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> is <math alttext="W sub x, end subscript, over m" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>W</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></msub><mo>/</mo><mi>m</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>.

The gravitational field strength of Planet <math alttext="X" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>X</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> is <math alttext="9.8 newtons per kilogram" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mn>9.8</mn><mtext> </mtext><mtext> </mtext><mtext> </mtext><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mi>N</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mo>/</mo><mi>k</mi><mi>g</mi></mstyle></mrow></math>.

The gravitational field strength of Planet <math alttext="X" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>X</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> is <math alttext="m W sub x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>m</mi><msub><mrow><mi>W</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>.

content.answer: The gravitational field strength of Planet <math alttext="X" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>X</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> is <math alttext="W sub x, end subscript, over m" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>W</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></msub><mo>/</mo><mi>m</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>.

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
